title: why do i get rust analyzer failed to load workspace everytime i open vscode
selftext:
hi .... i just started rust programming i'm entirely new to programming btw

i use vscode and when i open the app i get this pop up error

rust-analyzer failed to load workspace: Failed to find sysroot for Cargo.toml file /home/psych/hello-world/Cargo.toml. Is rust-src installed?: could not find libcore in sysroot path \`/usr/lib/rustlib/src/rust/src\`

rust-analyzer failed to load workspace: Failed to find sysroot for Cargo.toml file /home/psych/kvstore/Cargo.toml. Is rust-src installed?: could not find libcore in sysroot path \`/usr/lib/rustlib/src/rust/src\`

rust-analyzer failed to load workspace: Failed to find sysroot for Cargo.toml file /home/psych/psychstore/Cargo.toml. Is rust-src installed?: could not find libcore in sysroot path \`/usr/lib/rustlib/src/rust/src\`

rust-analyzer failed to load workspace: Failed to find sysroot for Cargo.toml file /home/psych/threadpool/Cargo.toml. Is rust-src installed?: could not find libcore in sysroot path \`/usr/lib/rustlib/src/rust/src\`

​

why is this and what can i do to solve this.   I have installed rust-src still no luck

I haven't been able to run any program so far
